subject: Concussions
Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Even as concerns grow about the impact of concussions on players’ long-term health, Kam Chancellor, a Seahawks safety, relishes big hits, the more violent the better.
snippet: Even as concerns grow about the impact of concussions on players’ long-term health, Kam Chancellor, a Seahawks safety, relishes big hits, the more violent the better.
